naslov: Prekrasno imanje s bazenom u Rogoznici (prodaja)
opis: Prekrasno imanje s dvije kuće i bazenom u Rogoznici prostire se na terenu od cca 640 m2. Imanje je uređeno u autohtonom dalmatinskom stilu gdje prevladava kamen, s uređenom okućnicom prepunom mediteranskog bilja. U dvorištu se nalazi i 200 godina staro stablo.  Bazen je idealno mjesto za odmor i opuštanje. Prva kuća je površine cca 160 m2 i sastoji se od blagovaonice, kuhinje, dnevnog boravka, hodnika, tri spavaće sobe, dvije wc/kupaonice, spremišta i potkrovlja. Na krovu se nalaze solarni paneli. Druga kuća površine cca 100 m2 sastoji se od kuhinje s kaminom, dnevnog boravka, wc/kupaonice, spavaće sobe i podruma od 44 m2. Cijelo imanje je opremljeno video nadzorom i alarmnim sustavom. Svaka prostorija je klimatizirana. Podno grijanje. Roštilj. Lokacija je vrlo atraktivna s obzirom da se nalazi na 250 m od plaže, u blizini obale i Marine Frape, a opet daleko od turističke vreve i buke. Idealno za one koje žele pronaći mir i tišinu uživajući pritom u svim darovima mediteranske prirode. A beautiful estate with two houses and a swimming pool in Rogoznica is spread over a plot of approx. 640 m2. The property is decorated in the autochthonous Dalmatian style where stone predominates, with a landscaped garden full of Mediterranean plants. There is also a 200-year-old tree in the yard. The pool is an ideal place for rest and relaxation. The first house has an area of ​​approx. 160 m2 and consists of a dining room, kitchen, living room, hallway, three bedrooms, two toilets/bathrooms, a storage room and an attic. There are solar panels on the roof. The second house of approx. 100 m2 consists of a kitchen with a fireplace, a living room, a toilet/bathroom, a bedroom and a basement of 44 m2. The entire property is equipped with video surveillance and an alarm system. Each room is air-conditioned. Underfloor heating. Barbecue. The location is very attractive considering that it is located 250 m from the beach, near the coast and Marina Frapa, yet far from the tourist bustle and noise. Ideal for those who want to find peace and quiet while enjoying all the gifts of Mediterranean nature.
